title: peralAm pErinbam uralAm
sahitya:
peralAm pErinbam uralAm manamE nI marudagiri murugan tozhuvadAl


anupallavi

  oru kaNa nAram avan tirunAmattai dinam karudik-karuttazhiya uruginAl urudiyAi


caraNam    mati vadanam tigazhum atishayamighu azhagum idazhinil tavazhum iniya punmuruvalum
ati vIra gambhIra Ananda svarUpamum idayamadil padiya nidam avanai ninaindAl
